aiOverview.text: AI assistants in 2025 have evolved significantly, with Claude, ChatGPT, and Gemini leading the market. Claude is known for its thoughtful responses and strong safety features, while ChatGPT excels in creative tasks and has the largest plugin ecosystem. Gemini integrates deeply with Google services and offers multimodal capabilities. For business use, specialized tools like Microsoft Copilot and Jasper AI provide industry-specific features. Most AI assistants now offer free tiers with premium plans ranging from $20-$25/month for individual users.

featuredSnippet.text: The top AI assistants in 2025 are: 1) Claude 3 Opus - Best for complex reasoning, 2) ChatGPT-4o - Best for creative tasks, 3) Gemini Ultra - Best Google integration, 4) Microsoft Copilot - Best for Office users, 5) Perplexity - Best for research.
